trans-unit.source: Defines the optional contract that a binding can implement to specify whether incoming requests are handled synchronously or asynchronously by the service.
trans-unit.target: 定義選擇性合約繫結可以實作以指定連入要求會以同步或非同步方式處理服務。

trans-unit.source: In some cases it may be more efficient for a binding to process messages with the synchronous <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情況下可能會更有效率使用同步處理訊息的繫結<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A>或<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A>方法。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding> class can optionally implement IBindingRuntimePreferences to indicate to callers that this is preferred.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding>類別可以選擇性地實作來向呼叫端指示這是慣用的 IBindingRuntimePreferences。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding>

trans-unit.source: If a binding does not implement IBindingRuntimePreferences, the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Service Model Runtime layer defaults to using the asynchronous versions of the `Receive` and `Request` methods.
trans-unit.target: 如果繫結未實作 IBindingRuntimePreferences，[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]服務模型執行階段層預設會使用的非同步版本`Receive`和`Request`方法。

trans-unit.source: If a binding does implement IBindingRuntimePreferences, the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Service Model Runtime layer checks the value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A> and uses that to determine whether to call the synchronous versions of the these methods (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A>) or the asynchronous versions (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.BeginReceive%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.BeginRequest%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.EndRequest%28System.IAsyncResult%29>.
trans-unit.target: 如果繫結確實有實作 IBindingRuntimePreferences，[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]服務模型執行階段層會檢查值<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>並使用該值來判斷是否要呼叫的同步版本，這些方法 (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A>或<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A>) 還是非同步版本 (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.BeginReceive%2A><xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29>或<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.BeginRequest%2A>和<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.EndRequest%28System.IAsyncResult%29>。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.EndRequest%28System.IAsyncResult%29></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.BeginRequest%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29>和</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.BeginReceive%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>

trans-unit.source: If IBindingRuntimePreferences is implemented by the binding and returns `true` from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A> property, it is recommended that you use the synchronous <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A> methods to receive messages from the channel.
trans-unit.target: 如果由繫結所實作，並傳回 IBindingRuntimePreferences`true`從<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>屬性，建議使用同步<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A>和<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A>方法來從通道接收訊息。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the binding does not implement IBindingRuntimePreferences or returns `false` from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A> property, it is recommended that you use the asynchronous <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.BeginReceive%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.BeginRequest%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.EndRequest%28System.IAsyncResult%29> methods.
trans-unit.target: 如果繫結未實作 IBindingRuntimePreferences 或傳回`false`從<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>屬性，建議您使用非同步<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.BeginReceive%2A>和<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29>或<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.BeginRequest%2A>和<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.EndRequest%28System.IAsyncResult%29>方法。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.EndRequest%28System.IAsyncResult%29> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.BeginRequest%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.BeginReceive%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>

trans-unit.source: Regardless of the value returned by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A> property, all bindings must still provide valid implementations of both the synchronous and asynchronous versions of the `Receive` methods for the specific channel types implemented.
trans-unit.target: 不論所傳回的值<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>屬性，所有繫結都仍然必須提供有效的同步和非同步版本實作`Receive`方法實作的特定通道型別。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about implementing custom channels, see [Developing Channels](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何實作自訂通道的詳細資訊，請參閱[開發通道](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether incoming requests can be handled more efficiently synchronously or asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出可以更有效率地同步或非同步方式處理傳入要求。

trans-unit.source: The standard (system-provided) bindings provided by [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] have implemented this interface and in some cases override the default value to process incoming messages synchronously.
trans-unit.target: 標準 （系統提供） 的繫結[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]已經實作這個介面，並在某些情況下覆寫要以同步方式處理傳入訊息的預設值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if requests can be handled more efficiently synchronously; otherwise<xref uid="langword_csharp_ false" name=" false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果處理要求可以更有效率地以同步方式;否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_ false" name=" false" href=""></xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, to handle requests asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>，以非同步方式處理要求。
